metadata.title: CVE-2018-8048 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Loofah gem through 2.2.0 for Ruby, non-whitelisted HTML attributesmay occur in sanitized output by republishing a crafted HTML fragment.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8048` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-loofah - 2.2.1-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ruby-loofah package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.1-1').
